articles.author: Chris Welch
articles.title: Oasis won’t use Ticketmaster’s dynamic pricing for North America tour - The Verge
articles.description: Oasis has decided not to use Ticketmaster’s dynamic pricing, which can lead to massively inflated ticket costs, for the North America leg of its upcoming reunion tour.
articles.content:
Oasis wont use Ticketmasters dynamic pricing for North America tour
